title: WTB - Very Specific Griffith (w/bat) RED Hindu -
author: arcadekrazy

posts.post_title: WTB - Very Specific Griffith (w/bat) RED Hindu -
posts.post_content:
Folks,

Looking for a very specific Clark Griffith with Red Hindu back.  The one I am looking for is trimmed, and measures short top to bottom.

I figure there can't be too many of these floating around.

I sold this particular card 10+ years ago (I think it was part of a larger lot I sold to a board member).

If anyone has any info, please reach out via PM.
Could it be the one in the upcoming Goodwin auction, is it cut close at top but not trimmed and but does appear a bit short.

Thanks Scott and the other board members who pointed out the Goodwin auction.

That does indeed look like the card.  I wonder how many multiples of what I sold it for I'll have to pay in order to get it back.

Wow,

Can't believe you located it that quick...congrats!
Indeed.  This board has always been a great resource full of all sorts of helpful folks.
